entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this afternoon. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then clearing. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 18 January 2023
